description:
Calculated - Total score based on an 8-item questionnaires ranking likelihood of fall asleep [Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1798888) and [Melendres MC, Lutz JM, Rubin ED, Marcus CL. 2004 (PubMed ID: 15342852)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15342852/)

[Search for all ESS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=epworth)
